subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Wisconsin and its tough man-to-man defense will test Syracuse on Thursday in the N.C.A.A. tournament. The Orange will counter with their trademark zone.
